text: The Pixel 2 and Pixel 2 XL are android smartphones developed by Google. It was announced in October 4, 2017. It was released in October 17, 2017. == Features == The Pixel 2 and Pixel 2 XL runs Android 8, they can upgrade to other versions like Android 9, Android 10 and Android 11 when they came out. It has a 4GB RAM. Both models has a 64GB storage options and 128GB storage options. The Pixel 2 has a 5.0 inch AMOLED display and the Pixel 2 has a 6.0 inch pOLED display. The Pixel 2 has a 2700mAh battery capacity and Pixel 2 XL has a 3520mAh battery capacity. The Pixel 2 has three colors such as black, blue and white, The Pixel 2 has two colors such as just back and black & white. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Google mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2017
title: Pixel 2
